message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe this is a good starting point for us.
I understand you value a larger share, Alice, but a 50/50 split is the fairest. Think carefully; the value decreases with each round.
Bob, time is literally money for me in this game!  I need a better share to account for that. This is my final offer above 60.
Alice, I'm trying to be fair. You're right that time works against you, but this offer still gives you a significantly larger share.
